item.title: Audriane add a quote by Franklin D. Roosevelt
item.description: "Men are not prisoners of fate, but only prisoners of their own minds." -- Franklin D. Roosevelt

item.title: Audriane add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Audriane add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Audriane add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "The best way to not feel hopeless is to get up and do something. Donâ€™t wait for good things to happen to you. If you go out and make some good things happen, you will fill the world with hope, you will fill yourself with hope." -- Barack Obama

item.title: Audriane add a quote by Tina Fey
item.description: "Do your thing and don't care if they like it." -- Tina Fey

item.title: Audriane add a quote by Richard P. Feynman
item.description: "Nobody ever figures out what life is all about, and it doesn't matter. Explore the world. Nearly everything is really interesting if you go into it deeply enough." -- Richard P. Feynman

item.title: Audriane add a quote by Barbara Taylor Bradford
item.description: "We are each the authors of our own lives, Emma. We live in what we have created. There is no way to shift the blame and no one else to accept the accolades." -- Barbara Taylor Bradford

item.title: Audriane add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Audriane add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Audriane add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson
